name: @things-elements/things-scene-chartjs
description: An element providing a starting point for your own reusable Polymer elements.

scripts.serve: watchify src/index.js -o things-scene-chartjs.js src/index.js & polymer serve
scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o things-scene-chartjs.js && uglifyjs things-scene-chartjs.js -m -c -o things-scene-chartjs-min.js
